channel.title: Resolutions on CrowderSoup
channel.description: Recent content in Resolutions on CrowderSoup

item.title: Resolutions for 2016
item.description: It seems like the “thing to do” at the beginning of each new year is to make New Years Resolutions. If you’re at all into blogging then you know that you then have to publish those resolutions for all the people who don’t read your blog to see. That’s who/what this post is for. I wanted to make my resolutions less about “I want to lose weight”, and more focused on programming, open source, and this blog.
